dialogueText: Are you satisfied with your newfound power?
Hmph... who do you think I am? It has been many moons since I needed to use even a fragment of my magic powers.
Oh? I can sense fear stirring in these woods.
Then it seems this is the perfect time for me to put these newfound powers to the test.
언제까지 나를 따라올 셈이니? 그만 눈 앞에서 사라져라.
좋은 구경을 놓칠 수 있나요, 음? 저 숲에 재미있는 게 있는 모양인데.
후훗... 그래, 공포가 무엇인지 아둔한 네게 직접 보여줄게.
